transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Hello.
Executive: Good afternoon sir. Dinesh speaking. I am from Chennai calling from backend team sir.
Customer: Hmm sollunga.
Executive: So account manager unga profile share pannirundhanga. So direct enquiries oda flow kamiya irukunu solli sollirundhanga.
Customer: Aamanga.
Executive: So athukaga backend team la share pannirundhanga. So enquiries promote panrathukaga. Actually enna sir issue?
Customer: First or package eduthom. Athukaprom TrustSeal package eduthom.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: TrustSeal package udaya main game direct enquiries adhika ma ungaluku varumnu sollirundhanga.
Executive: Aamanga sir.
Customer: But nanga first normal service enna eduthomo andha mari than ippayum iruku. Ethuvum improvement illingalae.
Executive: Sir illa. Ippo first neenga andha basic package vaichingalae. So athulayum vandhutu first month ungaluku konjam vandhutu down poa than irundhirukum. So athukapromati than vandhutu ungaluku andha second month start irukum. First month thanga nariya direct enquiries vandhuchi appo starting la edukkumbothu. Athukaprom thanga down aanathe.
Executive: Sir illa sir correct than. Ippo September month la vandhutu almost or 112 enquiries pathina neenga eduthutinga. 112 enquiries eduthirukinga. So TrustSeal la pogumbothu, so indha catalog la irukka ella data vayum pathina athuku share panni, so andha keywords ellame pathina andha higher service la promote pandrathu sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: So athuku or set of time ngarathu edukum. Yenna first andha basic service la varumbothu or 15 days time eduthu andha hosting ellame pannitu than ungaluku andha welcome arrange pannirupanga. So athukaprom indha basic service la irundhu idhu appdiye vandhutu andha TrustSeal service ku konjam change pandrathuku or set of time ngarathu edukum. Idhu konjam higher service ndrathunala pathina konjam time ngarathu edukum sir. Andha keywords pathina one by one than vandhutu promote panna mudiyum. Ippo namma pathina andha indexation idhellame iruku pathingala. So andha ovvoru keywords than vandhutu promote panna mudiyum. Ovvoruku ovvoru buckets pathina irukum ungaluku. So adha vachithan direct enquiries vandhutu promote panna mudiyum. Idhula or two months ngarathu neenga konjam time kudunga. So appothan vandhutu idhoda full weightage pathina nammaala paaka mudiyum idhula.
Customer: Seri okay sir. Idhula vandhutu neenga buyleads neenga continuous ah use pannunga. So ennodaya idhu pathina na ungaluku direct ah or enquiry ngarathu na ungaluku promote pandren. So first three months pathina unga catalog than work pannuvom. Yenna ippo neevas unnu sonnu namma eduthurukomna first three months pathina ungaludaya keywords pathina namma regular base la pathina promote pannuvom. So adhilirundhu ungaluku step by step ah kandippa ungaluku increase aagum.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Idhula neenga konjam buyleads mattum unga side la use pannunga. Unga side la neenga use pannumbothu than pathina ennala vandhutu adha promote panna mudiyum. Neenga contact buyer nu sonni neenga click pandra ovvoru buyleads vayum pathina adhu engaluku pathina tag aagum. So inniku indha customer indha buyleads purchase pannirukaru. Idhu ivarudaya preferred category, preferred location apdingara mari pathina location and then keywords. Idhu rendum vachithan pathina engalaala promote panna mudiyum. So unga side la irundhu neenga andha buyleads ngarathu neenga daily basis la neenga edunga. So ennodaya side la irundhu na ungaluku direct ah or enquiry calls ngarathu na ungaluku na promote panni kodukuren.
Customer: Okay sir. Unga name?
Executive: Dinesh.
Customer: Okay. Avanu Krishnan ngaravaru unga account manager. Enakku vandhutu share pannirundha mari enquiries oda flow vandhutu romba kamiya iruku apdingara mari vandhutu enakku account manager share pannirundharu. So athukagathan naane direct ah connect pannen. Enna actually problem ngarathu.
Customer: Seri okay nga.
Executive: Idhula conversion andha mari edhavadhu vandhuchinga sir? Flow eduthathu?
Customer: Order nga.
Executive: Aama sir aama. So buyleads oda quality eppdi irukku? Andha mari edhavadhu irundhuchina kuda na ungaluku athuku kuda support pannuven.
Customer: Call reach aagala andha mari edhavadhu issues irukinga?
Executive: Puriyala.
Executive: Ippo buyleads neenga eduthu use panringala. So edhavadhu call reach aagamal so andha mari edhavadhu issues irukinga buyleads oda quality la?
Customer: Appdi edhuvum illinga.
Executive: Okay. Edukkara buyleads ellame response irukinga buyer side la?
Customer: Uh?
Executive: Edukkara buyleads vandhutu buyer side la response irukanga nu kekkaren.
Customer: Onnum andha alavukku illinga.
Customer: Innaiku thaan oru moothu kuda oru order pudichom bill ellam potu anuppanom. Aana TrustSeal vandhu namma vandhu fake illa adhu unmai nu nirubikkirathukagathan namma TrustSeal verification service edukkrom. Aana nanga eppdi ungala namburathu than kekkanga andha customer.
Executive: Seri illa sir. One minute neenga konjam wait pannunga. Yenna ippo idhu vandhutu innum neenga edukkara andha preferred locations ellathulayume pathina projected aagala. So ungaluku vara direct enquiries pathina unga profile paarthan varuvanga. Unga profile view panni paarkumbothu namma andha TrustSeal certification oda pathina ungaluku review aagum. Adhu once ella customers kum konjam reach aagattum. Konjam oru two months ngarathu idhukagavu neenga kudunga. Andha promotion kagavu neenga kudunga. Na ungaluku kandippa support pandren. Neenga buyleads mattum neenga regular ah use pannunga. Na ungaluku direct ah vara enquiries ngarathu ungaluku support panni kodukaren.
Customer: Seri okay nga.
Executive: Seri nga. Okay sir. Edhavadhu concern irundhuchina neenga Krishnan kuda neenga mail pannunga and then enna kuda na ungaluku ennodaya personal number enna text pandren. Once neenga edhavadhu issue irundhuchina kuda direct ah enakku kuda neenga call pannunga. Seri nga. Na ungaluku support panni kodukaren. Seri nga. Okay. Okay sir. So and then vandhutu namma oru ticket concern raise pannirundhala buyleads enquiries kamiya flow kamiya irukku apdinnu solli. Hmm. So adha vachi or permission and close pannikallanga sir. Yenna adha namma close pannom apdinnathan backend la work panna mudiyathu. Yenna adhu or concern ave irukum adhu.
Customer: Seri okay nga.
Executive: So na adha close pannikkaren. Just ennodaya feedback mattum oru mail la varum. So eppdi ungaloda communicate pannanu oru feedback mattum varum. So adhu mattum konjam check panni kudunga. Athuku edhavadhu issue irundhuchu apdinnana neenga direct ah Krishnan or enakku kuda neenga contact pannunga. Seri nga.
Customer: Hmm seri okay nga.
Executive: Okay okay sir okay. Okay sir thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Direct enquiries flow is low.

- Normal service, no improvement.

- Customers asking how to trust them.



Resolution:

- Executive will promote direct enquiries.

- Executive asked to use buyleads regularly.

- Executive will provide support.

- Executive shared personal number for direct contact.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to use buyleads regularly.

- Customer to provide feedback on mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, enquiries, promotion, support
